segment.source: User Interface Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: User Interface Advanced Group Policy Management

segment.source: User Interface Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: User Interface Advanced Group Policy Management

segment.source: User Interface: Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: User Interface: Advanced Group Policy Management

segment.source: Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) adds a Change Control folder to each domain displayed in the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC).
segment.target: Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) adds a Change Control folder to each domain displayed in the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC).

segment.source: In an environment where multiple domains are managed with the GPMC, each domain is listed under the Domains folder in the console tree.
segment.target: In an environment where multiple domains are managed with the GPMC, each domain is listed under the Domains folder in the console tree.

segment.source: Each domain has a Change Control folder under it, and there is one archive of Group Policy Objects (GPOs) per domain.
segment.target: Each domain has a Change Control folder under it, and there is one archive of Group Policy Objects (GPOs) per domain.

segment.source: Within the details pane there are four primary tabs, providing access to both GPO-level settings and domain-level settings and commands for AGPM.
segment.target: Within the details pane there are four primary tabs, providing access to both GPO-level settings and domain-level settings and commands for AGPM.

segment.source: Additionally, there are Administrative template settings specific to AGPM.
segment.target: Additionally, there are Administrative template settings specific to AGPM.

segment.source: Contents Tab: GPO settings and commands and GPO-level delegation
segment.target: Contents Tab: GPO settings and commands and GPO-level delegation

segment.source: Domain Delegation Tab: AGPM e-mail notification settings and domain-level delegation
segment.target: Domain Delegation Tab: AGPM e-mail notification settings and domain-level delegation

segment.source: AGPM Server Tab: Domain-level archive connection settings
segment.target: AGPM Server Tab: Domain-level archive connection settings

segment.source: Production Delegation Tab: Production environment delegation
segment.target: Production Delegation Tab: Production environment delegation

segment.source: Administrative Templates Folder: Central configuration of logging and tracking, archive locations, and the visibility of features
segment.target: Administrative Templates Folder: Central configuration of logging and tracking, archive locations, and the visibility of features
